name: The Start of All Evil
description:
Etna & Flonne's trial 
for the most powerful Overlord 
starts soon!

name: Game of Overlord
description:
A mysterious voice came out of nowhere... 
Who was that?
And what's he up to!?

name: Hell's Kitchen
description:
The transformation of Laharl 
leads to unpredictable 
turn of events...

name: Dark Hero's Sorrow
description:
Disgusted by her unreliable vassal, Laharl-chan decides to 
retrieve herself on her own.

name: Storming Dark Assembly
description:
With the very best bribe, 
Laharl-chan heads to the Dark Assembly triumphantly. But...

name: The Mischievous Academy
description:
The next stage for training the most powerful Overlord 
is in the Evil Academy, where the values of good and evil 
are completely inversed...

name: Schoolhouse of Evil
description:
Getting past Mao's expulsion, 
the life in the academy is finally about to begin. 
However...

name: Waste Incinerator
description:
As the party goes to class 
to become Delinquent (VILLAIN), that man stands in their way again!

name: Gold Vein of Lust
description:
Today's lesson is "Fundraising Campaign". 
What is Raspberyl's real purpose? She's definitely up to no good.

name: Fork of Destruction
description:
Finally, the last class begins. 
Can the party graduate as the true Delinquent(VILLAIN)?

name: Throbbing Front
description:
What is power? What is love?
A sweet yet sad romantic comedy begins now! Please enjoy watching 
Love Revolution DISGAEA!

name: The Robust Girl-in-Love
description:
Two girls suddenly show up 
and lead Rozalin on her love training (?) 
in order to bring back the runaway Adell. Heh!

name: Poisonous Swamp of Love
description:
In front of Rozalin is the trial of the poisonous swamp. 
In spite of the Ailing Status, 
she goes straight in the rugged path of love without hesitation!

name: Boiling Sea of Love
description:
A girl in love would risk her life. 
Giving up is not an option. 
Let the flames of love burn!

name: The Battlefield of Love
description: After overcoming many challenges, Rozalin has become the warrior of love and is now heading to where Adell is waiting. But...?

name: Love Revolution Front
description:
Adell is freed, but Zenon has awakened.
Could the party 
save Rozalin...?

name: Snowy Road of Love
description:
The party is searching for 
the culprit behind the scene 
when that man shows up again...!!

name: Training Ground of Love
description: After defeating the Dark Hero, Adell starts to search his memory for the truth.

name: Wretched Plain of Love
description:
The true identity of the manipulator turns out to be Former Archangel Vulcanus. 
And what's he up to...?

name: Eternal Circuit of Love
description:
Power is love and love is power.
Now, a trial for the love of the two!!

name: Detective Labyrinth
description:
Just as the permanence of love are witnessed, bad news of Prinny comes in... 
In front of the terrible scene, 
stands out the Nether Detective...

name: Monopoly of the Nether Detective
description:
With clues lost in the labyrinth, another murder happens. 
To save the Prinnies, the true Detective emerges!

name: Sardine Fishery
description:
To find the truth of Prinny murder, the battle of detective heats up. 
Yet the cruelty of the incident has gone too far...

name: The Sad Crimson Moon
description:
"Want to know who did it?" 
A new character shows up. 
Now the tide is turning.

name: The Sinful End
description:
The showdown, finally!
In the name of Prinny Instructor, here comes the revenge.

name: Map of the Great War
description:
In the words of the Seraph, 
a shocking truth is revealed... 
To save the world, the party must find the Five Original Overlords.

name: The Super Scorching Storm Netherworld
description:
To revive the Five Original Overlords, Etna and her friends come to Scorching Storm Netherworld. 
Would they accomplish their task...

name: Symbol of Awe
description:
※※※Spoiler Alert※※※
The true identity of the Final BOSS will be revealed here.

name: The Lost Haven
description:
3 Original Overlords to go, 
but Killia seems to be distracted by something...

name: Claw Mark of the Tyrant Overlord
description:
Once again determined, 
Killia starts to tell the striking past between him and his destined enemy, Tyrant Overlord Baal...

name: Sanctuary of the Demon Fist
description:
The one who shows up before Killia is Zeroken, his junior disciple.
Shocking sexy beam episode

name: Closed Heart
description:
2 Original Overlords to go. 
For the battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal, Killia hurries with his friends. But...

name: Feast of Curry
description:
Usalia and Seraphina 
just won't wake up.
What on earth happened to them...!?

name: The Battle of Fate
description:
All 5 Original Overlords are awakened, but the dark solar meteor shower is coming.
The one who saves the day appears.
Who is this savior...

name: A Stage Staged
description: The battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal has started. The joy of forming the dream team is short-lived, and the battle shall continue.

name: Holy Puppet Show
description:
It's the final stage of the overlord training. 
Before the battle of the Final Boss, starts the final trial. But...

name: Tree of Stardust
description:
The next opponent is Flonne the warrior of love. 
But an accidents happens in her long awaited debut.

name: Crossroad of Angel and Demon
description:
Flonne keeps transforming.
Her power of love that makes the impossible possible finally reveals itself!

name: Majin's Armory
description:
As the opponent of the final trial, Etna now stands in the way! 
And what is her true hidden power...

name: The Fateful Divide
description: Completely exhausted in the final trial, Flonne and her friends are now targeted by evil hands...!

name: Indelible Scars
description:
Laharl announced a gathering 
during Flonne and Etna's absence! 
There was no time for grief 
as new enemies were making their move.

name: Guidepost for the Lost
description:
Let Valvatorez join and 
bring the brainwashed Prinnies 
back to normal.

name: Hero's Hunting Ground
description:
It turned out that the incident of Prinnies and the Red Moon 
were the doings of Super Hero Aurum. 
However, an even greater evil 
hid behind.

name: Creeping Abyss
description:
A powerful Prinny Bomb was made 
to devastate the world. 
The party set out to the Red Moon 
to save the Prinnies and the world.

name: Beckoning Tragedy
description:
The expansion of Prinny Bomb 
was beyond expectation. 
What would Laharl and his friends do?

name: Realm of Absolute Darkness
description:
The mastermind has finally been cornered 
after all these trails and hardships. 
Now, it's showtime!

name: The Tombstone of the Fool
description:
Axel showed up and interfered again 
as Laharl's party was about to 
challenge the Final Boss. 
Something was not right about him...

name: Instantaneous Easter
description:
With the medicine for two in hand, 
the party hurried back to where Etna was. 
Finally, the rowdy days 
were about to return...

name: Imminent Death
description:
Vulcanus, in company of Fallen Celestial Hosts. 
Here comes the counterattack of 
angry Etna!

name: The Great War Festival
description:
The memories of all those battles 
keep coming back. 
What will become of the training of strongest overlord 
and the final battle...

name: Investigation Start!
description:
Gordon, the Defender of Earth, 
arrives in the Netherworld to 
investigate the disappearance of Prinnies! 
What awaits him is...

name: Search for the Hero!
enemies emerge!
description:
Demons stand in the way 
of searching for Almaz! 
And the person behind them is...

name: Almaz is the Overlord!?
description:
The true mastermind is 
Almaz, whom they've been 
searching for?

name: Strategic Retreat!
description:
Defeated by Almaz, 
the party has to fight through 
the demon pursuers 
in order to retreat.

name: Information Gathering!
description:
The party starts to 
gather information about 
the hero title in order to 
deal with demon title.

name: Another Hero!
description:
Knowing the weaknesses 
of the demon title, 
the party decides to 
find the hero title.

name: Almaz's Title!
description:
Don Joaquin entrusts the title of hero 
to the party 
who overcame the trial.

name: Almaz Once More!
description:
The party confronts Almaz again 
with the hero title, only to find that 
Almaz's title has become "Almost Overlord"!

name: Showdown with the Great Overlord!
description:
The demon title that escaped from Almaz 
has materialized! 
Thus becoming Prinny 
the Great Overlord!

name: Follow your feelings
description: Maybe it's the Santa's costume, Usalia and the Mage feel a mysterious presence. What would they find out by that presence?

name: Knew it was you
description:
Prinnies with presents were witnessed by Laharl and the others. 
Are they  the culprit behind all this?

name: The Evil Academy in the Holy Night
description: The Evil Academy on Xmas eve. The joy for Laharl and his friend are short as they meet the Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
description:
Usalia and the Mage got worried whether they can make it to Xmas. 
What would Laharl think about that as Santa?

name: Xmas Hater
description: The Xmas is drawing near, but the presents is merely halfway done. Finally, the evil manipulator reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

name: Majin Etna Advents
description: None

name: Mirror Cake and Prinny
description:
Mirror Cake is indispensable for 
the traditional festival of Snow Melody Village. 
However, no one had foreseen the turbulence 
the Mirror Cake actually caused...

name: Mirror Cake Lab
description:
A painful scream echoed throughout the Netherworld. 
Fubuki rushed to the scene with others, 
and what they saw was...

name: The Avenger of Traditional Cuisine
description:
It should have been easy to retake the New Year's Food 
with Mao joining. 
But to everyone's surprise, 
that man stood in the way.

name: The Resolve of Shinobi?
description:
Fubuki and his friends were making steady progress in retaking food 
from Mirror Cake Prinny. 
But just as they thought everything was going well, 
something strange happened on Rozalin.

name: The Place Where Everything Begins
description:
The party arrived at Snow Melody Village, 
where everything began. 
The fight against Mirror Cake Prinny 
finally came to an end!

name: ○○ of the Red Fox
description:
In front of Prinny Kurtis, 
who was feeling the limits of his power, 
a Prinny with an old map 
appears.

name: Bambrooms of Mt. Demon
description:
In the mountains was the legendary ingredient 
that has been battling 
... no, evolving 
since the beginning of time!

name: Staff of Change
description:
Kurtis gets frustrated 
by failure, and begins 
the search of next item 
to shake off his anxiety.

name: Ra's Mirror Cake
description:
Don't tell me... 
it's Mirror Cake again.

name: On Being a Hero
description:
What's the difference? Harsh words 
struck him. 
And that man appeared 
in front of confused Kurtis!?

name: Anniversary Special Battle
description: None

name: Conquest Battle of Modified Prinny
description:
Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao just for fun. 
They gained enhancement at the cost of something precious 
and hence started their revenge...

name: MBC Grand Opening!
description:
A flyer 
got to Laharl. 
That was the beginning of the nightmare.

name: Cutie Demon Advents
description:
Laharl-chan and her friends are making their way 
through the intricate MBC venue. 
Just then, the second assassin 
shows up.

name: Beauty Hero
description:
Laharl-chan pushes forward with all her strength 
to regain her original form. 
However, will the next opponent 
be an easy one?

name: Definition of Beauty
description:
Laharl-chan is tired from 
a series of rowdy battles. 
Hope the next opponent 
is a decent one...

name: What True Beauty Is
description:
Finally, the finale. 
Laharl-chan vows to 
beat Mid Boss to win the championship 
and return to her original form.

name: Pure Flonne Advents
description: None

name: Mischievous Class, Part 1
description:
Raspberyl, the legendary graduate. 
Her course of producing new graduates from the Evil Academy 
to follow in her footsteps 
begins now.

name: Mischievous Class, Part 2
description:
While training with Zeroken, 
the group moves onward. 
However, the 2nd part-time Delinquent Teacher 
stands in front of them.

name: Mischievous Class, Part 3
description:
The group overcame the 2nd part-time Delinquent Teacher 
and went on. 
But for how long 
will their success continue?

name: Mischievous Class, Part 4
description:
All the classes had been completed. 
The only thing left to do was going back to the academy. 
At least that was the plan...

name: Mischievous Class, Part 5
description:
To Kyoko and Asuka, 
who had no idea 
what they lacked even after the brawl, 
Ms. Raspberyl spoke.

name: Raid Battle
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Reflection Special Battle
description: None

name: Conquest Battle of Modified Prinny
description:
Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao just for fun. 
They gained enhancement at the cost of something precious 
and hence started their revenge...

name: Path to Sakura Seeing
description:
"Let's go see Sakura!" 
Sicily never knew that 
these words would be the beginning 
of an upcoming event.

name: Magic Cutie Techniques
description:
Despite Sicily's confusion about transforming 
into a Magic Cutie all of a sudden, 
Pure Flonne rushes and defeats the enemies cheerfully. 
But what about the sakura seeing?

name: Salvation of Love
description:
The group chases after Darktina 
with Pure Sicily in the lead. 
In the meantime, 
Pure Silly practices the Magic Cutie Techniques.

name: Love's Miracle
description:
Darktina's blow 
hit Love Oracle 
with great damage. And the fate of Love Oracle... 
what will it be!?

name: Of being Magic Cutie
description:
Together with the new companion, 
Puretina, the party 
goes to the final battle 
to stop Love Oracle.

name: Normal BOSS
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare BOSS
description: Raid Battle Data

name: A challenge from Prism Rangers!
description: None

name: Netherworld Cat Cafe
description:
A cat cafe is now open in the Netherworld! 
Someone unexpected appears 
in front of Etna who comes 
for sweets instead of cats.

name: Partnership
description:
Virunga, the manager, 
has regained his composure. 
But why did Virunga open 
a cat cafe in the Netherworld?

name: Association of Cat Rights
description:
Before everyone knows it, 
the cats have escaped from the cafe!? 
Where have the cats gone!!

name: The Third Party Emerging!?
description:
Prinnies suddenly 
rushed in. 
Will a three-way battle that 
involves the Association of Cat Rights begin?

name: Bro's True Intentions
description:
The party takes a break 
after a heated battle with the Sardine Faction, 
but then they notice something strange.

name: Bloodis Advents
description: None

name: Fairy, Conquest Ver
description:
Fairies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao just for fun! 
They gained enhancement at the cost of something precious 
and hence started their revenge...

name: Undead, Conquest Ver
description:
The Undead had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao just for fun! 
They gained enhancement at the cost of something precious 
and hence started their revenge...

name: Sludge, Conquest Ver
description:
Sludges who have been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao just for fun! 
They gained enhancement at the cost of something precious 
and hence started their revenge...

name: Special Battle
description: None

name: Sister Artina Advents
description: None

name: Bread Eating Competition
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
to abolish bloomers. 
However, the road to victory 
is not easy.

name: Scavenger Hunt
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship in cooperation 
with Fuka and Ayame. 
But the opponent in the next event 
is not going to be a simple one!

name: Three-legged Race
description:
The sports disaster has entered the medium stage. Tiredness begins to appear 
on the faces of Raspberyl and others. 
And that man shows up 
in front of them.

name: Gymnastic Formation?
description:
Next up: Gymnastic Formation!
At last, it's an event other than running. 
Raspberyl and her friends 
should be happy about it...

name: Chicken Fight
description:
A clean Victory!
A startling declaration from Mao 
has baffled Raspberyl 
and her friends!?

name: Special Battle
description: None

name: Follow your feelings
description: Maybe it's the Santa's costume, Usalia and the Mage feel a mysterious presence. What would they find out by that presence?

name: Knew it was you
description:
Prinnies with presents were witnessed by Laharl and the others. 
Are they  the culprit behind all this?

name: The Evil Academy in the Holy Night
description: The Evil Academy on Xmas eve. The joy for Laharl and his friend are short as they meet the Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
description:
Usalia and the Mage got worried whether they can make it to Xmas. 
What would Laharl think about that as Santa?

name: Xmas Hater
description: The Xmas is drawing near, but the presents is merely halfway done. Finally, the evil manipulator reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

description: Christmas Events Reminiscence
